pages.text: ABOUT US For over 60 years, Hardee's has brought communities together with quality, delicious food. With more than 1,800 restaurants across the U.S., and locations in 13 countries, we are committed to the best tasting food to better serve our guests--From Made From Scratch™ Biscuits and Hand-Breaded Chicken Tenders™. WE'RE COMMITTED TO SERVING GREAT FOOD Carousel Left controls Indicators/dots Right controls The slideshow/carousel MADE FROM SCRATCH™ BISCUITS Hardee's has been known for more than 40 years for our Made From Scratch™ Biscuits. Our designated Biscuit Makers rise before the sun, and start their mornings at 4 a.m., hand-making each batch of biscuits from scratch every 15 minutes for biscuit clouds of flaky, buttery goodness. Order Now HAND-BREADED CHICKEN TENDERS™ We make our Hand-Breaded Chicken Tenders™ with our hands because it's the only acceptable way to make them. Made with all-white meat chicken, and hand-dipped in seasoned breading before fried to golden perfection. Order Now ANGUS BURGERS Fire seems like nothing special. But when it hits our premium third pound 100% angus beef, it transforms them into juicy charbroiled burgers as good as Wilber Hardee intended. Making burgers with fire should be the only way you make burgers, or you’ve no business doing it at all. Order Now Left and right controls/icons HISTORY OF HARDEE'S 1960s Wilber Hardee, opens his first Hardee's® restaurant in Greenville, North Carolina, on September 3, 1960. The one-of-a-kind menu included 15-cent hamburgers, 10-cent fries, and 20-cent milkshakes. By the end of the 60s, there were more than 200 Hardee's locations. 1970s Hardee's continues to grow, expanding its footprint and it's menu, including the addition of it's famous, fresh Made From Scratch™ Biscuits and Roast Beef Sandwich, which continue to be guest favorites today. 1980s In the 80s, Hardee's opens its 2,000th location, and continues its biscuit fame with the introduction of the Cinnamon 'N' Raisin™ biscuit. 1990s CKE Restaurants acquires Hardee's in 1997, creating a chain of 3,828 restaurants in 40 states and 10 foreign countries. 2000s Hardee's debuts its signature line of Thickburgers®--Delicious burgers made with premium third pound 100% angus beef patties, and introduces the iconic Monster Thickburger. 2010s Today, Hardee's is proud to still serve the delicious, quality food that made the restaurant a favorite for guests throughout the Midwest and Southeast, while delighting fans with new innovations like Froot Loops® Mini Donuts. view more view more CKE PRESS RELEASE View All Stories Aug 27, 2025 Hardee's helps raise more than $1 million for veterans, military families Aug 20, 2025 Hardee's Rolls Out Cherry-Inspired Summer Sips and Spicy Value Deals Jun 18, 2025 New Menu Items & Strategic Partnerships View All Stories

Contact Us
Based in Franklin, Tennessee, our headquarters is more than 250 people strong. We welcome you to get to know us a little better by exploring career opportunities, press inquiries, and our brand assets.

CAREERS AT HARDEE'S
Real people make real progress at Hardee’s. No matter where you start, you’ll be surprised how far you can go. Crew Up with us now.
Search Jobs
OUR
WINNING COMBO
Hardee's is a place where you can hit the ground running in an environment that encourages personal growth and promotes all who strive to advance. It’s our WINNING COMBO. No matter where you start, the sky’s the limit. Here you can put your potential to work with allies who support your vision for success. Ready for your next step?
Search Jobs
PUT YOUR
POTENTIAL TO WORK
Carousel
Left controls
Indicators/dots
Right controls
The slideshow/carousel
CREW MEMBER TO DISTRICT MANAGER
Meet Ashley. She joined our crew in 2016 and has created her own success story. Today she puts her potential to work as a shift manager and loves her team and the customers she serves. “I became a manager at 18. I’m a people person, and I aim to please. It’s not difficult to do that here.”
INCLUSION MAKES US STRONGER
Operating and franchising restaurants in nearly all corners of the world, we employ and serve people of all ages, ethnicities, backgrounds and beliefs. Our company is made up of people who look, think and are different, and we celebrate this diversity. Inclusion makes us stronger.
REIMAGINE WHAT FAST FOOD CAN BE
We feed happiness to the communities we serve through a passion to satisfy our guest by reimagining what fast food can be. Our passion is founded on five core values that speak volumes about who we are – servant leadership, action, accountability, entrepreneurial spirt and people first.
